Changelog
=========

1.0
---

- Reengineering to support images.
  [hannosch]

- Improve coverage and use plone.app.testing.
  [ggozad]

- Plone 4 compatibility.
  [ggozad, hannosch]

- pep-8
  [ggozad]

1.0b2
-----

- Added support for local UNIX sockets
  [ggozad]

1.0b1
-----

- Initial release
  [ggozad]
